Package Weight ‎0.11 Kilograms

Brand Name ‎Obami
Color ‎Multicolor
Manufacturer ‎My First Sports Bag
Part Number ‎My First Sports Bag
Sport Type ‎Baseball

Additional Information

ASIN B07RY9LFT6
Customer Reviews

4.3 out of 5 stars

4.3 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #5,092 in Toys & Games (See Top 100 in Toys & Games)
#59 in Preschool Musical Toys
#77 in Baby Musical Toys
Date First Available May 21, 2019

Price: $39.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:14 UTC – Details)

Product Description

THE PERFECT PLUSH TOYS: Fun Toys for All Ages to Enjoy. Great Gift Idea for Baby Shower, Kids Boys & Girls, Pre-School Children, Party Favors, Toddler, Birthday parties, and Christmas. IMAGINATIVE PLAY: Our Fluffy Sports Bag with Sound Playset, is Cute and Adorable but It’s Also Great for Enhancing Hand-Eye Coordination and Fine Motor Skills from a young age. And It Will Promote Your Kid’s Imagination, Creativity and Pretend-Play Skills through Fun and Safe Play.SQUEEZE THEM TO HEAR THE REAL SOUND: Sparks Children’s Imagination. Just Squeeze Each Plush Ball Toy for Realistic Sounds. Balls Make Individual Sounds and Cheers.PORTABLE TAKE THE FUN EVERYWHERE: With the Carrying Bag They Are Easy to Hold, Perfectly Shaped for Little Fingers and Helps Create Quality Time When Traveling, Playing with Friends Indoors and Outdoors.SET INCLUDES: Super Soft 5 Piece Plush Play Set with Individual Sounds. That Will Keep Him or Her Busy for Hours and Hours. 1) Sports Bag. 1) Plush Soccer Ball. 1) Plush Football. 1) Plush Baseball. 1) Plush Basketball. Sports Sounds and Cheers When Squeezed.WSHABLE: Can Wash by Water, Easy to Clean.

Washable

Can Wash by Water, easy to clean.

Sounds

Sparks Children’s Imagination. Just Squeeze Each Plush Ball Toy for Realistic Sounds. Balls Make Individual Sounds and Cheers.

Imagination

Promote Your Kid’s Imagination, Creativity and Pretend-Play Skills through Fun and Safe Play

【THE PERFECT PLUSH TOYS】: Fun Toys for All Ages to Enjoy. Great Gift Idea for Baby Shower, Kids Boys & Girls, Pre-School Children, Party Favors, Toddler, Birthday parties, and Christmas. IMAGINATIVE PLAY: Our Fluffy Sports Bag with Sound Playset, is Cute and Adorable but It’s Also Great for Enhancing Hand-Eye Coordination and Fine Motor Skills from a young age. And It Will Promote Your Kid’s Imagination, Creativity and Pretend-Play Skills through Fun and Safe Play.
【SQUEEZE THEM TO HEAR THE REAL SOUND】: Sparks Children’s Imagination. Just Squeeze Each Plush Ball Toy for Realistic Sounds. Balls Make Individual Sounds and Cheers.
【PORTABLE TAKE THE FUN EVERYWHERE】: With the Carrying Bag They Are Easy to Hold, Perfectly Shaped for Little Fingers and Helps Create Quality Time When Traveling, Playing with Friends Indoors and Outdoors.
【SET INCLUDES】: Super Soft 5 Piece Plush Play Set with Individual Sounds. That Will Keep Him or Her Busy for Hours and Hours. 1) Sports Bag. 1) Plush Soccer Ball. 1) Plush Football. 1) Plush Baseball. 1) Plush Basketball. Sports Sounds and Cheers When Squeezed.
【AGE】: 36 months+.
